thrust::system::omp::allocator< T >::rebind< U > Struct Template Reference

#include <memory.h>

List of all members.

Public Types

typedef allocator< U > other

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
template<typename U>
struct thrust::system::omp::allocator< T >::rebind< U >

The rebind metafunction provides the type of an allocator instantiated with another type.

Template Parameters:
UThe other type to use for instantiation.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<typename T >
template<typename U >
typedef allocator<U> thrust::system::omp::allocator< T >::rebind< U >::other

The typedef other gives the type of the rebound allocator.
